text: Edward Penn (born 3 January 1923) is a Kenyan former sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Kenyan male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Kenya Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Edward Penn
